title: Benchbook for U.S. District Court Judges
abstract:
Benchbook
for U.S. District
Court Judges
Federal Judicial Center

 
with March 2000 revisions
The Federal Judicial Center produced this Benchbook for U.S. District Court Judges
in furtherence of its mission to develop and conduct education programs for the
judicial branch. This Benchbook is not a statement of official Federal Judicial Center
policy. Rather, it was prepared by, and it represents, the considered views of the
Center's Benchbook Committee, a group of experienced dis
